metadata.title: CVE-2015-5531 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in Elasticsearch before 1.6.1 allowsremote attackers to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors related tosnapshot API calls.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5531` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elasticsearch - 1.7.3+dfsg-3
libelasticsearch1.7-java - 1.7.3+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.3+dfsg-3').
